channel.title: Need help with auth vote system!
channel.description:
Before any of you ask, yes i have put some prior knowledge into before posting.
Anyways, I added the mysql database and everything in my control panel, I just cant find a good tutorial or some good help with this. I am really struggling with this and need some major help.
Thanks guys! :D
Skype: uiotube
